title: Action Camera Extension
summary: Remote control your Sony camera. Get great pictures the easy way.
description: This is the official Sony Camera shutter application for your Sony SmartWatch 2, SmartBand™ SWR10 and SmartBand™ Talk SWR30.            With this app, you can control the shutter of your Action Cam and other cameras from Sony from a distance of up to 30 feet/10 meters. Take pictures using your SmartWatch, SmartBand™ or SmartBand™ Talk. You can also start and stop the video function in selected Sony camera models.            To use this app extension, you must have Smart Connect and/or the dedicated Sony app for your smart accessory installed on your Android smartphone or tablet.When you have installed this app, it will not appear on your home screen. Instead, in case you are using SmartBand™ or SmartWatch 2 it will be integrated into Smart Connect. Smart Connect app from Sony required. In case of using SmartBand™ Talk, it will be integrated into the SmartBand™ Talk dedicated Sony app. SmartBand™ Talk dedicated Sony app required.            Works with: Sony Action Cam and a wide range of Sony digital cameras and DV cameras. See complete list of compatible devices at https://developer.sony.com/develop/cameras/device-support/.            If you want to develop apps or app extensions for innovative Sony accessories, go to www.sonymobile.com/developer.            Enjoy! descriptionHTML:
This is the official Sony Camera shutter application for your Sony SmartWatch 2, SmartBand™ SWR10 and SmartBand™ Talk SWR30.

With this app, you can control the shutter of your Action Cam and other cameras from Sony from a distance of up to 30 feet/10 meters. Take pictures using your SmartWatch, SmartBand™ or SmartBand™ Talk. You can also start and stop the video function in selected Sony camera models.

To use this app extension, you must have Smart Connect and/or the dedicated Sony app for your smart accessory installed on your Android smartphone or tablet.

When you have installed this app, it will not appear on your home screen. Instead, in case you are using SmartBand™ or SmartWatch 2 it will be integrated into Smart Connect. Smart Connect app from Sony required. In case of using SmartBand™ Talk, it will be integrated into the SmartBand™ Talk dedicated Sony app. SmartBand™ Talk dedicated Sony app required.

Works with: Sony Action Cam and a wide range of Sony digital cameras and DV cameras. See complete list of compatible devices at https://developer.sony.com/develop/cameras/device-support/.

If you want to develop apps or app extensions for innovative Sony accessories, go to www.sonymobile.com/developer.

Enjoy!

Smart Connect extension for SmartBand™
Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2
Supports the new SmartBand™ Talk
comments: Almost useless. IF you can get a connection, it takes forever. Once you have a connection to your camera, you need to leave the phone screen on. It gobbles battery from every device connected. Start/stop command are slow. I can't imagine a time when this would be useful. I want to use the Smartband to start and stop recording of my Sony action camera on my motorcycle helmet. This software is too cumbersome to be of any use.
Does not connect Installs, camera app opens on Xperia Z3+ but SONY SW2 stays at 'Waiting for connection'.
